text: Eric Bengtson (1897–1948) was a Swedish composer who worked on many film scores. In 1938 he composed the music for the Ingrid Bergman film A Woman's Face (1938).Toila p.262 ==Selected filmography== * The Red Day (1931) * Servant's Entrance (1932) * Love and Deficit (1932) * Ocean Breakers (1935) * Russian Flu (1937) * Thunder and Lightning (1938) * A Woman's Face (1938) * Art for Art's Sake (1938) * Dollar (1938) * Styrman Karlssons flammor (1938) * Only One Night (1939) == References == == Bibliography == * Soila, Tytti. The Cinema of Scandinavia. Wallflower Press, 2005. == External links == * Category:1897 births Category:1948 deaths Category:Swedish composers Category:Swedish male composers Category:20th-century composers Category:20th- century Swedish male musicians
title: Eric Bengtson
